explains: n. 外围，边缘；圆周；圆柱体表面

sentences.en: The condition makes it difficult for patients to see objects at the periphery of their vision.
sentences.cn: 这种病症使患者难于看见视觉边缘的物体。

sentences.en: To divide the empire into English core and colonial periphery, as Bailyn does, devalues the achievements of colonial culture.
sentences.cn: 把帝国划分为英国核心和殖民地外围，就像拜伦所做的那样，会贬低殖民文化的成就。

sentences.en: Taste buds are concentrated at the tip and rear of the tongue and around its periphery.
sentences.cn: 味蕾集中在舌尖、舌根及舌边。
